```{r Variable mes y categorizarla}
CovLP <- CovLP %>%
  mutate(Mes = case_when(Dia >= "2020-01-01" & Dia <= "2020-01-31" ~ 'Ene',
                         Dia >= "2020-02-01" & Dia <= "2020-02-29" ~ 'Feb',
                         Dia >= "2020-03-01" & Dia <= "2020-03-31" ~ 'Mar',
                         Dia >= "2020-04-01" & Dia <= "2020-04-30" ~ 'Abr',
                         Dia >= "2020-05-01" & Dia <= "2020-05-31" ~ 'May',
                         Dia >= "2020-06-01" & Dia <= "2020-06-30" ~ 'Jun',
                         Dia >= "2020-07-01" & Dia <= "2020-07-31" ~ 'Jul',
                         Dia >= "2020-08-01" & Dia <= "2020-08-31" ~ 'Ago',
                         Dia >= "2020-09-01" & Dia <= "2020-09-30" ~ 'Sep',
                         Dia >= "2020-10-01" & Dia <= "2020-10-31" ~ 'Oct',
                         Dia >= "2020-11-01" & Dia <= "2020-11-30" ~ 'Nov',
                         Dia >= "2020-12-01" & Dia <= "2020-12-31" ~ 'Dic'       ))
                         
CovLP$Mes = factor(CovLP$Mes, levels = c("Ene","Feb","Mar","Abr","May","Jun",
                                 "Jul","Ago","Sep","Oct","Nov","Dic"))
```

```{r Para graficar}
CovLPR <- gather(CovLP, Indicador , IValor, 2:11)
options(digits = 3)
```
